summary: A texture replacer for Hentai's Seraphim Armor (Ported by person123456789).
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Logo15.png[/img]



[center]Featured on Skyrim Mods Weekly

[youtube]tJYi2yjamuI[/youtube][/center]


The following is a port of the [url=http://tes.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=38475]Dark Seraphim Armor - Blade[/url] mod for Oblivion, it's a texture Replacer for Hentai's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7010]Seraphim Armor ported by person123456789[/url]. It will replace the armor's look with a new black/red, darker themed one.

[i] Please note, this is a texture replacer, no new items will be added, it'll just change the look of the Seraphim Armor. It is required that you download and install first [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7010]person123456789 Seraphim Armor Skyrim Edition[/url] [/i]

Requirements
-----
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7010]Seraphim Armour by Hentai ported by person123456789[/url] (Clickable link)


Install
-----
Extract the folder into your Skyrim's Data folder and overwrite.
(C:Steamsteamappscommonskyrimdata)

Uninstall
-----
Re-install the original mod and overwrite.

Copyrights
-----
You can use these textures for whatevers, for the meshes please refer to the corresponding authors.


Credits
-----
[url=http://tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=293510]Hentai a.k.a. zotman12[/url] for the original Seraphim Armor, and for his permission to let me doodle with his work. Kissies to him, go check out his awesome work!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1224386]person123456789[/url] for bringing the armor to Skyrim and letting me release the retexture for his! :D
[url=http://bethsoft.com/]Bethesda Softworks[/url] for the great game they let us mod.
[url=http://tesnexus.com]The Elder Scrolls Nexus[/url] because all of you guys rule. 'nuff said.

Body Mods Used on Screenshots
-----
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Better Females by Bella[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5521]MTOH and Yinsiyue Hairstyles[/url]
author: Hentai - person123456789 - iLily
